newsitem.title: IRAQ: Saddam accuses U.S. of trying to destroy Arabs.
newsitem.headline: Saddam accuses U.S. of trying to destroy Arabs.

text.p: Iraqi leader Saddam Hussein has accused the United States of trying to destroy the Arab people as a nation so Washington could dominate global energy markets.
"I believe the American capitalism creates problems and genocide campaigns and starvation," Saddam said in remarks carried by Baghdad newspapers on Wednesday.
"As for Arabs they have to be torn to pieces as a nation, their culture and civilisation obliterated and wealth pillaged so that America would control energy markets in the world."
The remarks were made during a cabinet meeting in which Saddam urged his ministers to tighten their belts further.
Iraq is under punitive U.N. trade sanctions which the United States does not want to see lifted until Baghdad fully adheres to all the 1991 Gulf War-related resolutions.
